name: Speed Up
overview:
Speed Up is an arcade racing game, notably influenced by Ridge Racer. It features three circuits (Advanced, Beginner and Expert) and lets the player choose between 8 cars with different specifications.

In this game, races follow an elimination system, in which after each lap is completed, the car that was running last is disqualified. The deciding lap will involve the two cars left out of the six which started the race.
